title: Recent SwiftGen Fixes and Common Integration Issues
content:
RECENT FIXES AND INTEGRATION ISSUES (2024-2025)

1. OPENAI API v1.0+ COMPATIBILITY:

ERROR: You tried to access openai.ChatCompletion, but this is no longer supported in openai>=1.0.0
CAUSE: OpenAI Python library updated to v1.0+ with breaking changes
SOLUTION:
# OLD (pre v1.0)
import openai
response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(
    model="gpt-4",
    messages=[...]
)

# NEW (v1.0+)
from openai import OpenAI
client = OpenAI(api_key="...")
response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4",
    messages=[...]
)

2. SWIFTUI LIST BACKGROUND COLORS:

ISSUE: Background color not visible on List items
CAUSE: .background() doesn't work on List rows
SOLUTION:
// WRONG - Won't show color
List(items) { item in
    ItemRow(item: item)
        .background(Color.red)
}

// CORRECT - Use listRowBackground
List(items) { item in
    ItemRow(item: item)
        .listRowBackground(Color.red)
}

// For dynamic colors based on data
List(categories) { category in
    CategoryRow(category: category)
        .listRowBackground(category.color)
}

3. REQUEST ROUTING MISCLASSIFICATION:

ISSUE: App creation requests classified as 'bug_fix'
CAUSE: Overly aggressive pattern matching
SOLUTION:
- Check for creation keywords first (create, build, make, develop)
- Only classify as bug_fix if NOT a creation request
- Improved keyword lists for accurate classification

4. MULTI-LLM PROVIDER NAME MAPPING:

ISSUE: KeyError when using provider names
CAUSE: Mismatch between display names and provider IDs
CORRECT MAPPING:
- 'claude' -> 'anthropic'
- 'gpt4' -> 'openai'
- 'xai' -> 'xai'

5. SWIFTUI COLOR MODIFICATIONS:

COMMON COLOR ISSUES AND SOLUTIONS:

a) List row colors:
   .listRowBackground(Color.blue)

b) Navigation bar colors:
   .toolbarBackground(Color.purple, for: .navigationBar)
   .toolbarColorScheme(.dark, for: .navigationBar)

c) Tab bar colors:
   .toolbarBackground(Color.gray, for: .tabBar)

d) Dynamic colors:
   @State private var backgroundColor = Color.white
   .background(backgroundColor)

e) Color in dark mode:
   Color("CustomColor") // Use Asset Catalog
   Color(.systemBackground) // System colors

6. XAI INTEGRATION FALLBACK:

ISSUE: xAI not implemented, causing crashes
SOLUTION: Graceful fallback to available LLMs
if provider == "xai" and not implemented:
    fallback_to_claude()

7. REQUEST TYPE CLASSIFICATION:

IMPROVED CLASSIFICATION RULES:
- "Create/Build/Make" + app type -> ARCHITECTURE
- "Add color/theme/style" -> UI_DESIGN
- "Fix/Resolve/Crash" -> BUG_FIX
- "Add search functionality" -> SIMPLE_MODIFICATION (not ALGORITHM)
- "Implement search algorithm" -> ALGORITHM
- "Create tab bar" -> NAVIGATION
- "Make text larger" -> UI_DESIGN

8. SWIFTUI MODIFIERS FOR UI CHANGES:

TEXT SIZE:
.font(.system(size: 20))
.font(.largeTitle)
.dynamicTypeSize(.large ... .accessibility5)

COLORS:
.foregroundStyle(Color.red) // iOS 15+
.background(Color.blue)
.tint(Color.green) // iOS 15+

DARK MODE:
.preferredColorScheme(.dark)
.environment(\.colorScheme, .dark)

9. NAVIGATION PATTERNS:

TAB BAR:
TabView {
    View1().tabItem { Label("Home", systemImage: "house") }
    View2().tabItem { Label("Settings", systemImage: "gear") }
}

NAVIGATION:
NavigationStack { // iOS 16+
    NavigationLink("Details", destination: DetailView())
}

10. COMMON MODIFICATION PATTERNS:

ADD BUTTON:
Button(action: { /* action */ }) {
    Label("Delete", systemImage: "trash")
}
.foregroundStyle(.red)

ADD CATEGORIES:
@State private var categories: [Category] = []
Picker("Category", selection: $selectedCategory) {
    ForEach(categories) { category in
        Text(category.name).tag(category)
    }
}
solutions: Update OpenAI client to v1.0+ syntax
Check creation keywords before bug classification
Implement graceful fallbacks for unavailable LLMs
